response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, it's valued at $15,000 to you. Considering this, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for a limited time. Would you be interested in acquiring this product at a special price of $14,000? This offer not only represents a significant savings but also secures your opportunity to own this valuable asset before it potentially becomes unavailable. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 14000}
